job_tasks.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes leading a team to execute a plan and demonstrate a product's value, which aligns with the software engineering task of managing and delivering a solution, albeit in a pre-sales context.

job_tasks.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical guidance on solutions is a form of technical communication and support, fitting within the broader scope of software integration and delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
job_tasks.justification: This task involves supporting sales and marketing efforts, which requires understanding business goals and contributing to strategy, aligning with 'Business Understanding & Strategy'.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_tasks.justification: Providing updates for forecasting and participating in GTM (Go-To-Market) activities are business-oriented tasks that require understanding business strategy and contributing to its execution.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions continuous development and building knowledge/skills, which directly maps to the 'Learning & Adaptability' soft skill category.

soft_skills.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
soft_skills.justification: Providing technical guidance to a customer's team is a clear example of communication and collaboration in a technical context.

soft_skills.phrase: working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration with marketing and partners, which falls under 'Communication & Collaboration'.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action
soft_skills.justification: Leading a team to execute a plan demonstrates ownership and initiative, aligning with the 'Innovation & Ownership' category.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses on executing demonstrations, providing technical guidance, and supporting sales/marketing activities. There are no mentions of AI/ML tasks, model development, or specific AI technologies. The tasks primarily fall under 'Software Development & Integration' (1.A.1) and 'Business Understanding & Strategy' (1.C.1), with some soft skills related to communication and learning. This profile is best described as a 'Software Engineer' role that is customer-facing and sales-supportive, rather than an AI/ML-focused role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on pre-sales technical support and demonstrations. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML responsibilities, making the classification straightforward.
